name: Old Movie Musical Quotes! Trivia Game | Movie Mixture | 25 Questions

questions.text: 'I do not find the arrangement of your features completely disgusting.' -Cyd Charisse as Ninotchka Yoschenko
questions.explanation:
Silk Stockings.

	Also starring Fred Astaire as Steve Canfield, George Tobias as Peter Boroff, Peter Lorre as Brankov, and Jules Munshin as Bibinski.

questions.text: 'What's WRONG with the way I talk? What's the big idea? Am I dumb or something?' -Jean Hagen as Lina Lamont
questions.correct: Singin' In The Rain & Singin In The Rain & Singing In The Rain
questions.explanation:
Singin' In The Rain & Singin In The Rain & Singing In The Rain.

	Also starring Gene Kelly as Don Lockwood, Donald O'Connor as Cosmo Brown, and Debbie Reynolds as Kathy Selden.

questions.text: 'When I shall sit, you shall sit. When I shall kneel, you shall kneel, etcetera, etcetera, etcetera!' -Yul Brynner as King Mongkut
questions.correct: The King And I & King And I
questions.explanation:
The King And I & King And I.

	Also starring Deborah Kerr as Anna Leonowens and Rita Moreno as Tuptim.

questions.text: 'It's not the money I love. It's the not having it I hate.' -Debbie Reynolds as Molly Brown
questions.correct: The Unsinkable Molly Brown & Unsinkable Molly Brown
questions.explanation:
The Unsinkable Molly Brown & Unsinkable Molly Brown.

	Also starring Harve Presnell as Johnny Brown and Audrey Christie as Gladys McGraw.

questions.text: 'A man can't turn tail and run just because a little personal risk is involved. What did Shakespeare say? 'Cowards die a thousand deaths, the brave man... only 500'?' -Robert Preston as Harold Hill
questions.explanation:
The Music Man & Music Man.

	Also starring Shirley Jones as Marian Paroo, Buddy Hackett as Marcellus Washburn, Hermione Gingold as Eulalie Mackechnie Shinn, and Ron Howard as Winthrop Paroo.

questions.text: 'Why didn't you tell me I was in love with you?' -Fred Astaire as Don Hewes
questions.explanation:
Easter Parade.

	Also starring Judy Garland as Hannah Brown, Ann Miller as Nadine Hale, Peter Lawford as Johnny Harrow, and Jules Munshin as Francois.

questions.text: 'The way of all flesh, Junior. The way of all flesh.' -Gene Kelly as Gabey
questions.explanation:
On The Town.

	Also starring Frank Sinatra as Chip, Jules Munshin as Ozzie, Ann Miller as Claire Huddeson, Betty Garrett as Brunhilda Esterhazy, and Vera-Ellen as Ivy Smith.

questions.text: 'If there's anything I hate, it's you.' -Van Johnson as Jeff Douglas
questions.explanation:
Brigadoon.

	Also starring Gene Kelly as Tommy Albright, Cyd Charisse as Fiona Campbell, and Jimmy Thompson as Charlie Chisholm Dalrymple.

questions.text: 'You're too small to be a man, too big to be a mouse. I reckon you're a rat!' -Gene Nelson as Will Parker
questions.explanation:
Oklahoma! & Oklahoma.

	Also starring Gordon MacRae as Curly McLain, Shirley Jones as Laurey Williams, Gloria Grahame as Ado Annie Carnes, and Eddie Albert as Ali Hakim.

questions.text: 'You're just about the prettiest girl I ever accquainted.' -Russ Tamblyn as Gideon Pontipee
questions.correct: Seven Brides For Seven Brothers & 7 Brides For 7 Brothers
questions.explanation:
Seven Brides For Seven Brothers & 7 Brides For 7 Brothers.

	Also starring Jane Powell as Milly Pontipee, Howard Keel as Adam Pontipee, Tommy Rall as Frank Pontipee, Julie Newmar as Dorcas Galen, and Jeff Richards as Benjamin Pontipee.

questions.text: 'There is no difference between the magic rhythms of Bill Shakespeare's immortal verse, and the magic rhythms of Bill Robinson's immortal feet.' -Jack Buchanan as Jeffrey Cordova
questions.correct: The Band Wagon & The Bandwagon & Bandwagon & Band Wagon
questions.explanation:
The Band Wagon & The Bandwagon & Bandwagon & Band Wagon.

	Also starring Fred Astaire as Tony Huinter, Cyd Charisse as Gabrielle Gerard, Oscar Levant as Lester Marton, and Nanette Fabray as Lily Marton.

questions.text: 'For five years, this finger has been naked as a jay bird. Now, I'm gonna warm it up with a ring.' -Nancy Kwan as Linda Low
questions.explanation:
Flower Drum Song.

	Also starring Miyoshi Umeki as Mei Li, Benson Fong as Master Wang, Jack Soo as Sammy Fong, James Shigeta as Wang-Ta, and Juanita Hall as Madame Liang.

questions.text: 'Happppppppy New Year!!!' -Joe. E Brown as Captain Andy Hawks
questions.explanation:
Show Boat & Showboat.

	Also starring Howard Keel as Gaylord Ravenal, Ava Gardner as Julie LaVerne, and Kathryn Grayson as Magnolia Hawks.

questions.text: 'Even a poor tailor deserves some happiness!' -Leonard Frey as Motel Kamzoil
questions.explanation:
Fiddler On The Roof.

	Also starring Topol as Tevye, Molly Picon as Yente, Paul Mann as Lazar Wolfe, and Norma Crane as Golde.

questions.text: 'It might as well be spring.' -Jeanne Crain as Margy Frake
questions.explanation:
State Fair.

	Also starring Dana Andrews as Pat Gilbert, Dick Haymes as Wayne Frake, Vivian Blaine as Emily Edwards, Charles Winninger as Abel Frake, and Fay Bainter as Melissa Frake.

questions.text: 'I'm a good girl, I am!' -Audrey Hepburn as Eliza Doolittle
questions.explanation:
My Fair Lady.

	Also starring Rex Harrison as Professor Henry Higgins.

questions.text: 'I suspect she won't live through the night, she has four fatal diseases.' -Margaret O'Brien as Tootie Smith
questions.correct: Meet Me In St. Louis & Meet Me In St Louis & Meet Me In Saint Louis
questions.explanation:
Meet Me In St. Louis & Meet Me In St Louis & Meet Me In Saint Louis

	Also starring Judy Garland as Esther Smith, Lucille Bremer as Rose Smith, and Tom Drake as John Truett.

questions.text: 'Yes, it is possible for someone to hit you hard, real hard, and for you to not feel it at all.' -Shirley Jones as Julie Jordan
questions.explanation:
Carousel.

	Also starring Gordon MacRae as Billy Bigelow, Cameron Mitchell as Jigger Craigin, Barbara Ruick as Carrie Pipperidge, and Claramae Turner as Cousin Nettie.

questions.text: 'You louse!' -Kathryn Grayson as Lilli Vanessi
questions.explanation:
Kiss Me Kate.

	Also Starring Howard Keel as Fred Grahame, Ann Miller as Lois Lane, Tommy Rall as Bill Calhoun, and James Whitmore as Slug.

questions.text: 'Money, pardon the expression, is like manure. It's not worth a thing unless it's spread around, encouraging young things to grow.' -Barbra Streisand as Dolly Levi
questions.correct: Hello Dolly! & Hello Dolly & Hello, Dolly! & Hello, Dolly
questions.explanation:
Hello Dolly! & Hello Dolly & Hello, Dolly! & Hello, Dolly.

	Also starring Walter Matthau as Horace Vandergelder, Michael Crawford as Cornelius Hackl, Marianne McAndrew as Irene Molloy, Danny Lockin as Barnaby Tucker, and E.J. Peaker as Minnie Fay.

questions.text: 'If all you care about is here, this is a good place to be.' -Rossano Brazzi as Emile de Becque
questions.explanation:
South Pacific.

	Also starring Mitzi Gaynor as Nellie Forbush, John Kerr as Joe Cable, Ray Walston as Luther Billis, and Juanita Hall as Bloody Mary.

questions.text: 'I'd sell my soul for one long ball player. Just one!' -Robert Shafer as Joe Boyd
questions.explanation:
Damn Yankees & Damn Yankees!.

	Also starring Tab Hunter as Joe Hardy, Ray Walston as Mr. Applegate, Gwen Verdon as Lola, and Russ Brown as Benny Van Buren.

questions.text: 'You have brought music back into my life. I had forgotten.' -Christopher Plummer as Captain Georg Von Trapp
questions.correct: The Sound Of Music & Sound Of Music
questions.explanation:
The Sound Of Music & Sound Of Music.

	Also starring Julie Andrews as Maria, Eleanor Parker as Baroness Schrader, Peggy Wood as Mother Abbess, and Charmian Carr as Leisl Von Trapp.

questions.text: 'It's not a pretty face, I grant you, but underneath it's flabby exterior is an enormous lack of character.' -Oscar Levant as Adam Cook
questions.correct: An American In Paris & American In Paris
questions.explanation:
An American In Paris & American In Paris.

	Also starring Gene Kelly as Jerry Mulligan, Leslie Caron as Lise Bouvier, Nina Foch as Milo Roberts, and Georges Guetary as Henri Baurel.

questions.text: 'Don't read novels, they'll only depress you; don't wear powder, it ruins the complexion; don't wear corsets, they spoil the figure.' -Leslie Caron as Gigi
questions.explanation:
Gigi.

	Also starring Maurice Chevalier as Honore LaChaille, Louis Jourdan as Gaston LaChaille, Eva Gabor as Liane d'Exelmans, and Hermione Gingold as Madame Alvarez.
